document_data.mainbody:
Udzgul Thairharrow was a farmer in the village of Maskyrs Eye in the Vast in the late 13 or early 14 century DR.
He was considered to be half-witted.
When the folk of Maskyrs Vale came to investigate the collapse of old Maskyrs Tower, Udzgul claimed to have spotted a silvery doorway appearing for an instant in the air high over the ruins at sunset,It is unknown when these events occur, but given that Khonduil was still alive as of the late 1350s DR, it is presumed to be within his lifetime and thus somewhere in the late 13 early 14 centuries DR.
Udzgul was deceased by the late 1350s DR.
